message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  I'm feeling generous today, but this offer won't last forever.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair.  Let's get this done.
Bob, time is money, and we're both losing out. I'll meet you halfway - 55/45.  Take this deal before inflation eats away at our potential profits!
